mapper.select: SELECT Commodity_ID,Commodity_Name,Commodity_Description,Commodity_TypeID,Commodity_Price,Commodity_Picture,Commodity_State,CommodityType_Name FROM `tb_commodity` left join `tb_commoditytype` on `tb_commodity`.Commodity_TypeID = `tb_commoditytype`.CommodityType_ID where 1 = 1
mapper.update: update `tb_commodity` set Commodity_Name = #{Commodity_Name}, Commodity_Description = #{Commodity_Description}, Commodity_TypeID = #{Commodity_TypeID}, Commodity_Price = #{Commodity_Price}, Commodity_Picture = #{Commodity_Picture}, Commodity_State = #{Commodity_State} where Commodity_ID = #{Commodity_ID}
